key_features: Live the way you want with S$200 statement credits that can be used with trending restaurants or fashion brands.
Enjoy up to 50% savings at premium dining locations with Love Dining by Platinum.
Enjoy 1-for-1 first drink and complimentary drinks with purchase at some of the most bespoke bars in Singapore with Chillax by Platinum.
Enjoy up to 25% off à la carte spa services

Enjoy complimentary green fees* with a paying companion on weekdays, and two paying companions on weekends at premier golf and country clubs across Singapore, Cambodia, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand and Vietnam.

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
Please refer to the American Express website (go.amex/moneysmart) for the most up to date information on card benefits and its terms & conditions.
rewards: Give back to yourself when you spend—earn a total of 2 Membership Rewards points* for every full S$1.60 spent.
Your spending goes even further at our Platinum 10Xcelerator Partners like Maison 21G and The Hour Glass, where every full S$1.60 spent gives you 10 Membership Rewards points.
Be spoilt for choice. From a lavish feast to a shopping spree, treat yourself and take a pick from over 200 rewards in our Membership Rewards Catalogue.
Fly with freedom. Enjoy permanent waiver of the miles transfer fee (worth S$40) with the American Express Platinum Credit Card.
Downsize your Card bills, anytime, anywhere, by using your Membership Rewards points to pay for any purchase made with your American Express® Platinum Credit Card.
Your points never expire, which means you can take all the time to need to collect, redeem, and enjoy.
dining: Privileges of up to 50% savings at selected restaurants in some of the best luxury hotels in Singapore with Love Dining @ Hotels by Platinum.
A range of delectable cuisines await, island-wide, with up to 50% off at our handpicked selection of restaurants with Love Dining @ Restaurants by Platinum.

Unwind with a drink - or maybe two. From bespoke cocktails to new twists on old classics, enjoy 1-for-1 first drink and complimentary drinks with purchase at some of the most bespoke bars in Singapore with Chillax by Platinum.
shopping: Own your style in your favourite brands with up to S$200 statement credits every year from Amex Platinum.
Your spending goes even further at our Platinum 10Xcelerator Partners, where every full S$1.60 spent gives you 10 Membership Rewards points
90-days purchase protection* automatically insures your purchases against accidental damage or theft, up to S$10,000 per incidence of theft of damage.

eligibility: Card Members will not be eligible to the Welcome Offers stated on AMEX website
Not applicable with any other Amex offers, promotions, in-house offers, programmes and vouchers

fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.80% p.a. compounded if payment of the closing balance in your statements is not made in full; or 3% p.a. on top of prevailing interest rate in the event that your account has three or more defaults in the last 12 months

minimum_income.singaporean_pr: Singaporean/PR Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment.
minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income Card application is subjected to customers meeting the regulatory minimum income requirement and internal assessment.
